article_title: Will The Obamacare Cadillac Tax Increase Worker Wages?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: The answer depends on whether employers respond to the Cadillac tax by trimming health benefits to avoid the tax, or instead simply keep their health benefits as is and pass the tax onto their employees. For employers who trim health benefits I have a high degree of confidence that on average, worker wages will rise. For employers who absorb the tax increase, average worker wages will fall. There is good scientific evidence to support these predictions.
